Got another ?: How do you change the default run level in 11.10?
what is running twice?
huh?
you mean 11.10, not 11.10
u dont need to change runlevels
sudo su - to root (tty1 -- ctl-alt-f1), then stop lightdm, then uninstall .debs related to nvidia/nouveau, blacklist nouveau in /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf, then run NVidia.run
How can I determine what .debs are related to nvidia/nouveau?
dpkg -l|grep -i nvidia
dpkg -l|grep -i nouveua
dpkg -l|grep -i nouveau
don't forget to blacklist nouveau (it may linger and try to get loaded on startup and conflict with nvidia)
